name: Brazil
declaringWar: I have to do this, for the sake of progress if nothing else. You must be opposed!
attacked: You can see how fruitless this will be for you... right?
defeated: May God grant me these last wishes - peace and prosperity for Brazil.
tradeRequest: My friend, do you think you can accept this request?
uniques: No damage penalty for wounded units <for [Air] units>

name: Kongo
attacked: You hurt me! we never forget this!
defeated: My people never will accept you crown!
tradeRequest: My friend, do you think you can accept this request?

name: Romania
declaringWar: Prepare your neck, this is war!
attacked: You dont have sense of you're are doing!
defeated: Please, dont touch in the monasteries...
tradeRequest: My friend, do you think you can accept this request?
uniques: [-50]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities] <when at war>
Earn [+100]% of killed [Military] unit's [Cost] as [Golden Age points]

name: Mali
declaringWar: You dont have spiritual abundance! i will show how to make a true nation for you people!
attacked: This have a price! and you will pay!
defeated: Ok, you win. Stay with my richness, i dont care.
tradeRequest: My friend, do you think you can accept this request?
uniques: [+2 Gold] [in all cities] <with [1] to [2] neighboring [Luxury resource] tiles>
[+3 Gold] [in all cities] <with [3] to [4] neighboring [Luxury resource] tiles>

name: Zulu
startIntroPart1: Your people kneel before you, great warrior Shaka of the Zulu Kingdom. As you rose from a place of exile to become the true leader of the Zulus, you ushered in changes throughout the Zulu society, implementing new laws and cultural reforms that strengthened the position of your kingdom. However, it was your tenacity in the art of war that truly established your reputation, as your tactics and strategies on the battlefield forever changed the face of combat across the plains of southern Africa.
startIntroPart2: Most formidable king, your people once again long for the unity and strength your leadership afforded them. Can you return the Zulu kingdom to such great prominence? Will you build a civilization that stands the test of time?
declaringWar: None will slow our progress, not even you! Prepare for war!
attacked: Your arrogance will only lead you to defeat!
defeated: My warriors have failed, and so I failed them.
introduction: I'm Shaka of Zulu. Don't try to move, warrior, or I'll destroy you.
hateHello: You say? What are you doing here?

name: Jerusalem
declaringWar: By god's grace we will not allow these atrocities to occur any longer. We declare war!
attacked: May god have mercy on your evil soul.
defeated: I for one welcome our new conquer overlord!
tradeRequest: My friend, do you think you can accept this request?
uniques: [Faith] cost of purchasing items in cities [-50]%
